name: Discover Financial Services
summary: Discover Financial Services is a major American banking and payment services company, best known for its Discover Card and a broad suite of consumer financial products including credit cards, loans, and deposit accounts. It operates the Discover, Pulse, and Diners Club International networks and is among the largest credit card issuers in the U.S. In May 2025, Discover was acquired by Capital One, with all Discover brands transitioning under the Capital One umbrella.
